en: give a slap on the back
give a slap on the back

ngiemboon: Epʉ̀a ée metʉ̌a tà tsɔ̌ ncʉ̀a nzsè te wó wɔ́.
en: There are so many people at the market that there is no passage.

ngiemboon: À fʉ̌a nzsè tà tsɔ̌ ncʉ̀a nzsè zɔ̌ laʼte yé.
en: He took the wrong route so much so that it was a passerby who pointed it out to him.
